skills.name: bootstrap-development
skills.definition: Build minimum infrastructure so coding agents can build the rest. Create just enough (Prompt Improver, Persona Store, Agent Executor, CLI Runner) that agents can construct remaining features through PRs.

skills.name: verification-workflow
skills.definition: Arena-style dialectic verification: Assess (parallel domain experts) → Challenge (adversarial scrutiny) → Arbitrate (synthesize verdict) → Learn (update KB and skills with methodology improvements)

skills.name: prompt-improvement
skills.definition: Analyze agent prompts for conflicts, ambiguity, missing output formats, and structure issues. Score and suggest improvements.

skills.name: agent-persona-management
skills.definition: Store reusable agent definitions as YAML files with system_prompt, model, temperature, requires_sandbox, and tags. Categories: assessment, verification, synthesis, research, coding, custom.

skills.name: e2b-sandbox-integration
skills.definition: Expose E2B sandbox operations through REST API: create, execute, pause/resume, logs, file operations. Integrate with workflows for hypothesis testing.

skills.name: parallel-agent-execution
skills.definition: Run multiple Claude Code agents in parallel using E2B sandboxes. Each agent gets isolated context, unique branch, dedicated log file.

skills.name: ralph-loop-autonomy
skills.definition: Long-running autonomous agent workflows using stop hooks. Loop continues until completion_promise is met or max_iterations reached.

skills.name: composable-query-layer
skills.definition: Three modes of intent expression: Natural Language Query (agents/power users), Structured Navigation (humans, click-to-zoom), Saved Recipes/Dashboards. URL encodes query state.

skills.name: primitive-library
skills.definition: Taxonomy of UI primitives: Atomic (Icon, Badge, Text), Entity (ProjectNode, ServiceNode), Relationship (edges with styles), Container (GraphCanvas, EntityList), Composite (DependencyExplorer, HealthDashboard).

skills.name: ai-arena-debate
skills.definition: Multi-model AI debate system for hypothesis validation. Claude, Gemini, GPT debate in structured rounds until consensus or deadlock.

skills.name: agentic-tool-hierarchy
skills.definition: Compositional hierarchy for Claude Code tools: Slash Commands (primitives) → Sub-agents (parallelization) → MCP Servers (external integrations) → Skills (lifecycle managers).

skills.name: custom-model-training
skills.definition: Progression from API+RAG → Fine-tuning → Custom Training → Hybrid Intelligence. Nanochat-style $100-1000 custom models for domain-specific understanding.

skills.name: graph-service-federation
skills.definition: Cross-project queries with unified data spine. Project becomes zoom level, not container. Federation merges data with deduplication and conflict resolution.

skills.name: unified-agent-framework
skills.definition: Single AgentExecutor handles all parallel agent work across environments (local, sandbox). Synthesis is pluggable (Chairman, Voting, Summary). Compute backends are swappable via ComputeGateway.

skills.name: compute-gateway-pattern
skills.definition: Abstract compute backends like LLMGateway abstracts LLM providers. create_environment, execute, execute_agent, terminate methods.

skills.name: synthesis-strategies
skills.definition: Pluggable strategies for combining multi-agent results: VotingSynthesis (fast, no LLM), SummarySynthesis (LLM-based summary), ChairmanSynthesis (authoritative judgment).

skills.name: document-intelligence-pipeline
skills.definition: Five-agent pipeline for document analysis: Concept Extractor → Requirement Miner → Relationship Mapper → Staleness Detector → Classifier.

skills.name: concept-extraction-schema
skills.definition: Standard schema for extracted concepts: name, type, definition, status, domain, related_entities, source_quote, confidence.

skills.name: requirement-mining-schema
skills.definition: Standard schema for mined requirements: id (REQ-XXX), text, type, priority, source_concept, source_quote, verification, status.

skills.name: document-classification-taxonomy
skills.definition: Taxonomy for document classification: types (plan, concept, guide, reference, report, session, archive), statuses, actions.

concepts.name: CommandCenter
concepts.definition: AI Operating System for Knowledge Work - unified hub for multiple business projects providing centralized monitoring and orchestration

concepts.name: Veria
concepts.definition: AI-Native Compliance and Distribution Platform for tokenized real-world assets

concepts.name: MRKTZR
concepts.definition: AI Marketing and Partnership Intelligence platform

concepts.name: VISLZR
concepts.definition: Composable Operating Surface - unified query interface for CommandCenter

concepts.name: Graph-Service
concepts.definition: Entity and relationship storage with graph queries

concepts.name: LLMGateway
concepts.definition: Unified interface for multiple LLM providers with cost tracking

concepts.name: AgentExecutor
concepts.definition: Unified entry point for running agents across environments

concepts.name: ComputeGateway
concepts.definition: Unified interface for compute backends (E2B, Docker, Modal)

concepts.name: AI Arena
concepts.definition: Multi-model AI debate system for hypothesis validation

concepts.name: Document Intelligence
concepts.definition: Extract structured knowledge from document corpora
